data.oai_dc:dc: 2012 Arthropod Abundance data for each sampling point and sampling event. There are separate columns for each arthropod order. Numbers are counts. coleo=Coleoptera, colle=Collembola, de=Dermaptera, di=Diptera, ep= Ephemeroptera, he=Hemiptera, hy=Hymenoptera, le=Lepidoptera, or=Orthoptera, ps= Psocodea, s= spiders (Araneae), th=Thysanoptera. Data collected in the field and analyzed in the lab.
